name: The Phantom Thief
description:
The Phantom Thief Gameplay

You are a night guard in a giant mansion, but you're not alone. The Phantom Thief is hiding in the dark and is trying to steal valueable items and you have to report on everything that gets stolen while you're not looking. Pay attention or what's hiding in the dark will slip right through your fingers.

Content
  • A completly randomized infinitely long room with valuables all around
  • Over 15 different objects to get deceived with, half of them with incredible worth.  Such a nice target for the Phantom Thief...
  • A unique gameplay experience every time
Controls
  • Aim your flashlight with your mouse
  • Click the three categories on the hud to report a missing item
  • That's it! Being a night guard is just that simple.
Spooky 2D Jam 2022

This game was created for the Spooky 2D Jam 2022 hosted by Theo Clarke. The theme for the jam was What's hiding  in the dark?. The time limit was 48 hours, of which I only used 24 hours. This is a solo entry and there are no premade assets. Everything was made by me, with the exception of some of the sound effects (lightning, thunder, footsteps) from freesound.org

Credits
  • Game Design: me
  • Code: me (using Unity & Visual Studio 2019)
  • Music: me (using FL Studio 20 - Producer Edition)
  • Art: me (using Krita)
  • Sound Effects: freesound.org
